From the moment I saw you, I knew I was going to spend the rest of my life avoiding you.
I was oping for a battle of wits, but you appear to be unarmed.
I didn't mean to push all your buttons, I'm just looking for mute.
If I give you a straw, will you go suck the fun out of someone else's life?
My heart has no room for you, but the trunk of my car definitely does.
I love the sound you make when you stop talking
The fact that jellyfish have survived for millions of years despite not having brains must be a real comfort for you.
My therapist told me that a great way to get rid of my anger is to write letters to the people I hate and then burn them. I did that, but now I don't know what to do with the letters.
Have you ever had one of those days where you are holding a stick and everyone looks like a pinata? It is one of those days.
